name: Miner (Data-Tronic)
overview: Miner is a Boulder Dash clone developed by Øystein Berg and published by Data-Tronic. The year of release is not known. Unlike most Boulder Dash clones on the Commodore 64, this one was built from the ground up, and not made using the Boulder Dash Construction Kit. Berg programmed the game using just green, black, and some white to make it look as if it was done on a monochrome computer such as the Commodore PET.
